segments.text: I'm going to go to the concession stand and get some popcorn and Coke .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you talking about ? We always eat the stuff here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But what's a movie without munchies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't say I was going to deprive myself .
segments.speaker: S2
